Title: Eddy Locke: Viktor Strakov
Descriptions: Survivor, I've got a problem on my hands, and I reckon you're the one to solve it. There's this real nasty piece of work out there, goes by the name of Viktor Strakov. He used to be a part of my spec ops team before this whole mess started, but once everything went to hell, he took a dark turn. Word is, he's been doing some vile stuff since then, like raiding survivor camps, trading innocent lives for supplies, and worse. Now, I've got a score to settle with this guy, and I've got word that he's holed up at his bunker in the quarry. I need you to track him down and put an end to his reign of terror. Just be warned, Strakov's got a reputation for being one slippery customer. Keep your wits about you, and let's make sure he don't trouble anyone else in these parts.
